projects.title: Industrial Catalysis Lab
projects.description:
In 2018 the High Pressure equipment will be moved to the "Industrial Catalysis Lab".
For the realization of this new building, input is given on technical details from the users point-of-view.
Performed HAZOP-study.

contributors.headline: Research Technician / Area Supervisor Industrial Catalysis Lab at TU Delft
Adviseur Projecten Facility Management bij Technische Universiteit Delft

projects.title: New Building Applied Sciences TU Delft
projects.description:
In 2016 the TU Delft ChemE-department (and also Biotechnology and BN) will move to a new building (TNW-Zuid). Also a new Catalysis Lab will be made, near the RID. In the process towards moving to the new building a lot of preparation is needed:
- Drawing maps with layout of:
  - all the facilities
  - all the setups (on scale, to check if it all fits)

Meetings to discuss and calculate the needed facilities.

Making an inventory of all (special) equipment that has to move.

Dispose unneeded equipment.

profile_positions.title: Research Technician / Area Supervisor Industrial Catalysis Lab

profile_positions.description: Experiments: Electrolysis with Hoffman setup, Gaschromatography, Fuel Cells and Solar Cells
profile_positions.title: Teacher Practicum Basis Vaardigheden (PBV)

profile_positions.description:
Giving Technical Support to Ph.D.'s and Postdoc researchers.
Performing Research on Soot Oxidation, usually for the automotive industry. (Shell, Daimler, Bosch, Cummins, Wärtsila).
Teaching "Practicum Basis Vaardigheden" to first-year students (since 2009)
Responsible for equipment, like Sixflow-reactor, TPR, Autoclaves.
Intermediate between companies and Ph.D.'s/postdocs for ordering equipment, chemicals, etc.
Building and designing setups.
Work is done in the section Catalysis Engineering (CE); belonging to the Department of Chemical Engineering (ChemE).
profile_positions.title: Research Technician Catalysis Engineering

profile_positions.description:
In the months november and december I give the first year students the "Practicum Basis Vaardigheden".
I started this in 2009.
In the first season (2009-2010) I gave this together with Jorge Gascon.
In the seasons 2010-2011 and 2011-2012 I give this lessons together with Canan Gucuyener. In season 2012-2013 together with Hossein Khajavi, in season 2014-2015 together with Damla Keskin and in season 2015-2016 with Eli Elderkamp.

After these lessons the students know how :
- to work safely in the lab
- to operate equipment under high pressure and temperature
- a GC works
- a Refractometer works
- a destillation setup works and how to construct a McCabe-Thiele diagram.
- to build a electrolysis setup
- to make a leakfree connection
- to write a report
profile_positions.title: Teacher Practicum Basis Vaardigheden (PBV)

volunteer_experiences.description:
From August 2004 to June 2017 I was editor of the weekly clubmagazine "De Vrije Worp" for the sport club DKC. This magazine was made with the software programme Adobe Pagemaker.
Besides my function as editor, I also assisted in actions of the PR-committee to get funding for our club.
